identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a cinematic, immersive movie booking experience that feels like entering a theater.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix cinema aesthetics with modern SaaS usability.
Emotion First: Every interaction should build anticipation for the movie.
Content is King: The movie posters and trailers are the heroes.
Zoom In: Focus on details like seat texture and ticket stubs.
Negative Space: Use darkness to let the content shine.

usage.headings: Nunito Black (900) or Bold (700) - Tight tracking

components.strategy: Hybrid: Shadcn for logic/forms, Custom Tailwind for layout/visuals.

buttons.primary: bg-primary hover:bg-red-700 text-white font-bold rounded-full shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(220,38,38,0.4)] transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary hover:bg-secondary/80 text-white font-semibold rounded-full border border-white/10

cards.movie: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-white/10 bg-card hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300
cards.seat: w-8 h-8 rounded-t-lg rounded-b-sm transition-all duration-200 hover:scale-110 cursor-pointer

components.inputs: bg-secondary/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg h-12

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Tetris Mode) for Landing, Control Room Grid for Admin.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Force dark mode in tailwind.config.js. Do not allow light mode toggle.
3. FONT: Import Nunito from Google Fonts in index.css (@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Nunito:wght@300;400;600;700;900&display=swap');).
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Tetris Grid' for the movie listing on the home page.
5. SEATS: Build a custom SeatGrid component. Do not use a library for the grid itself, use CSS Grid.
6. ADMIN: Keep the admin panel dense ('Control Room' grid). Use a sidebar layout.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for mock data.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and movie cards.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
